content:
Example of an API webhook indicator

The request body will contain the type of indicator and the relevant attributes which you can extract and use.
When a new trading indicator is sent as a notification, we will use your registered webhook URL to send the indicator to you. You will receive an HTTP request similar to the one below.

  1. Example: 
    {
     'type': 'indicator',
     'data': '{
        'trading_type': 'Long',
        'leverage': 1,
        'buy_price': 205.0,
        'sell_price': 215.0,
        'buy_date': 1733913000,
        'sell_prediction_date': 1733999400,
        'risk': 4,
        'market_direction': 'Bull',
        'percentage_change': 5.1,
        'stoploss': 200,
        'trading_type_24h': null,
        'percentage_change_24h': -1.5,
        'risk_24h': 5,
        'leverage_24h': 2,
        'stoploss_24h': 190,
        'trading_pair': 'SOL/USD'
     }'
    }
  2. More Information:

    For more information about the format of incoming indicators, visit:

    Indicator Integration Example

    After cloning the repository or downloading the raw file, import the MarketRaker_Example_Indicator.postman_collection.json into Postman.
    A collection of example indicators will now be accessible to you.
